messages.subject: Help with weapon info
messages.msgSnippet: I was woundering if anyone would be able to point me into the direction of a website that has pictures and info on most fuedal era weapons, I am big on martial
messages.messageBody:
I was woundering if anyone would be able to point me into the
direction of a website that has pictures and info on most fuedal era
weapons, I am big on martial arts weapons and I want a site that
carries as much info on them as I can find. I have been looking up
specific weapons but there are more about weapons I havent see yet
that I want to learn about. So any help would be greatly appreciated.
